properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 2:56PM PST until February 13 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt and seas 9 to 11 feet expected.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST THURSDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON
